results.deck: 10,000 Bullets is an action game by Taito. Players control Crow, a gunslinger in a world in which gunslingers fight each other to gain their opponents blood and make themselves stronger. 10,000 Bullets shares elements with games like Max Payne and GunZ.
results.name: 10,000 Bullets

results.deck: Another instalment in the SingStar franchise, comprising songs from popular boy and girl bands.
results.name: SingStar Boy Bands vs Girl Bands

results.deck: Action Girlz Racing puts you in the driving seat in a completely new and wonderful way! For the first time ever you can pick your favourite Action Girl and take to the roads to race around fairy-tale castles, holiday resorts and even through school corridors while the teachers arenâ€™t looking!
results.name: Action Girlz Racing

results.deck: A sequel to the PS1 fighting game based on the popular Japanese Tokusatsu TV show released for the PS2.
results.name: Ultraman Fighting Evolution 2

results.deck: The basic premise is a theme park with a bunch of mini games that you have to solve. The game is based on the book of the same name.
results.name: Goosebumps HorrorLand

results.deck: Join in the musical with the third title in the franchise.
results.name: High School Musical 3: Senior Year Dance!

results.deck: Explore and roam around new and official courses in my Horse & Me 2. Features multiplayer and customization options too.
results.name: My Horse & Me 2

results.deck: The third installment in the Ultraman fighting evolution series of fighting games based on the popular tokusatsu super hero TV show.
results.name: Ultraman Fighting Evolution 3

results.deck: The fourth installment in the Ultraman Fighting Evolution series based on the popular tokusatsu super hero t.v. show.
results.name: Ultraman Fighting Evolution Rebirth

results.deck: A kart racing game on the PlayStation 2 and PC staring the generally disliked marketing ploy.
results.name: Crazy Frog Racer 2

results.deck: Use ten different vehicles to race and battle through different courses while listening to the games Death Metal soundtrack.
results.name: Earache: Extreme Metal Racing

results.deck: Japan only game starring a female mini skirt wearing police officer.
results.name: The Mini-Skirt Police

results.deck: CR Shinseiki Evangelion - Shito, Futatabi is the twelfth release in the Hisshou Pachinko * Pachi-Slot Kouryaku series
results.name: CR Neon Genesis Evangelion : Angels Return

results.name: Monster Trux: Offroad

results.deck: A 3D plaformer that is a prequel to the Disney/Pixar movie.
results.name: Monsters, Inc. Scream Team

results.deck: Based on the TV show of the same name.
results.name: Telly Addicts

results.deck: A 3rd person on the rails shooter co-op game in which sheriff Fortman and Prisoner Valdez are forced to fight a mysterious cult.
results.name: Twin Caliber

results.deck: The fourth entry in Gainax's Princess Maker franchise.
results.name: Princess Maker 4

results.deck: Play as a mother or a father as you care for an adopted princess until she reaches her 18th birthday.

results.deck: A raising sim targeted at the female demographic.
results.name: Dear My Sun!! Musuko Ikusei Capriccio

results.deck: Buzz!: The Pop Quiz will test your knowledge of music from the 1990's to the present day.

results.deck: Similar to Konami's Dance Dance Revolution. Notable for being the first published title by company RedOctane.

results.deck: Known as Sengoku Basara in Japan, Devil Kings is a hack-and-slash action game set during the Warring States era of Japanese history.
results.name: Devil Kings

results.deck: An alternative take on the classic Harvest Moon formula, Innocent life puts the player in control of a robot called Life. Learn to farm and develop human emotions whilst trying to save Heartflame Island. Developed exclusively for PSP.
results.name: Innocent Life: A Futuristic Harvest Moon

results.deck: A 3D PS2 remake of the GBA action RPG Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories.
results.name: Kingdom Hearts Re:Chain of Memories

results.deck: This disc-based Rock Band pack brings downloadable content to those of you who can't (or won't) get it online.
results.name: Rock Band Track Pack Volume 2

results.deck: A raising sim based on the School Rumble manga/anime series.
results.name: School Rumble: Neru Musume wa Sodatsu

results.deck: A video game based on the Love Hina manga and anime
results.name: Love Hina Gorgeous: Chiratto Happening!!

results.deck: The 2008 iteration of Sony's NBA series.
results.name: NBA '08

results.deck: Cabela's Legendary Adventures is a hunting game for the PSP, PS2, and Wii
results.name: Cabela's Legendary Adventures

results.deck: The game takes place between episodes 17 and 18, while Ed and Al are being escorted by Major Armstrong to the Central City by train. Then things go wrong.
results.name: Fullmetal Alchemist and the Broken Angel

results.deck: A visual novel-like game featuring the characters from the anime series Mahoromatic.

results.deck: FreeStyleGames' DJ Hero uses a turntable controller to bring Guitar Hero-like gameplay to more genres and styles of music.
results.name: DJ Hero

results.deck: Secret Service puts you in the role of a Secret Service agent trying to bring order after the newly inaugurated United States President is shot on Inauguration Day.

results.name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 6

results.deck: Blazing Souls is a SRPG from developer Neverland.
results.name: Blazing Souls

results.deck: Spy Fiction is a stealth-based video game by Sammy Studios and Sega for the PlayStation 2. The game is promoted as "stealth action inspired by genre-defining espionage classics" and gives players the ability to disguise themselves as any character in the game.
results.name: Spy Fiction

results.deck: AC/DC Live is a standalone expansion for the Rock Band platform. It features 18 of the classic rock band's most popular songs, recorded live during concert. New 360 and PS3 versions contain a code that allows the songs to be imported into other Rock Band titles as DLC.
results.name: AC/DC Live: Rock Band

results.deck: Enhanced, upgraded and expanded version of Dai Senryaku VII published by Valcon Games.

results.deck: A fandisk for the visual novel otome game "Hiiro no Kakera."
results.name: Hiiro no Kakera: Ano Sora no Shita de

results.deck: A further iteration in the SingStar franchise for both PlayStation 2 and 3, dedicated solely to Swedish pop supergroup, ABBA.

results.deck: An America-only sequel to SingStar Pop for the PlayStation 2.
results.name: SingStar Pop Vol. 2

results.deck: An Australia-only installment in the SingStar franchise for PlayStation 2, featuring tracks from the top of the charts in recent times.
results.name: SingStar Hottest Hits

results.deck: Defender is a remake of the classic arcade game.
results.name: Defender

results.deck: The Black Plague is transforming everyone but unicorns into horrible creatures. Can Pryzm and Karrock, his troll rider solve this huge problem?

results.deck: A pinball game released in Japan followed by Europe. Based on the popular anime adaption of the Akira manga.

results.deck: An adventure game based on the light novels / anime Kanokon. It stars a boys' adventures with animal spirits (pictured, pettanko gray-haired wolf and large-chested blonde/brunette fox) who masquerade as fellow high school students.

results.deck: The second game in the School Rumble series.

results.deck: An adventure game for adults, and the sequel to Prism Heart. There is also an anime series based on the game, named Prism Ark.

results.deck: An adult visual novel adventure game developed by Ã¢ge for the PC. It was later ported to the PS2 and Dreamcast under the title Rumbling Hearts, with the adult elements removed. It later received a full anime adaption in 2003.
results.name: Kimi ga Nozomu Eien

results.deck: An adult visual novel for the PC, usually known as "They Are My Noble Masters". It was later released with the adult elements removed, with the added subtitle Otsukae Nikki, for the PS2.
results.name: Kimi ga Aruji de Shitsuji ga Ore de

results.deck: An otome dating sim RPG about an Arabian princess who makes a bet with her parents to avoid an arranged marriage. Can she raise 10 million gold in 25 days, or will she be forced to give up the dream of love?
results.name: Arabians Lost: The Engagement on Desert

results.deck: An action/adventure game by Grasshopper Manufacture based on the Blood Plus anime series.
results.name: Blood Plus: One Night Kiss

results.deck: An adventure game with action fighting sequences based on the Blood Plus anime series. It tells the story of what happened in the missing year between episode 32 of 33.
results.name: Blood Plus: Souyoku no Battle Rondo

results.deck: Developed by Studio Liverpool, this is the fifteenth game in the Official Formula One games.
results.name: Formula One 06

results.deck: Deadly Strike is a rare European release of the "Simple 2000 Ultimate Series Vol. 16: Sengoku vs. Gendai" Japanese Game for the Playstation 2.

results.deck: An adventure game for adults. A PS2 version was released under the title Soul Link Extension with the adult elements removed but with additional material.
results.name: Soul Link

results.deck: The third game in the Marl Oukoku series.
results.name: Tenshi no Present: Marl Oukoku Monogatari

results.deck: Set in 1939, follow Indiana Jones as he searches all around the globe for the Staff of Moses.

results.deck: The sixth game in the Growlanser series.
results.name: Growlanser VI: Precarious World

results.deck: A compilation of the first 3 Growlanser games.

results.deck: Fu-un Shinsengumi is a PS2 action game based on the historical Shinsengumi military group in the late Edo period in Japan. The artwork was done by Yoji Shinkawa of the Metal Gear Solid series.

results.deck: Sequel to Fu-un Shinsengumi released on the PS2.

results.deck: Myself ; Yourself is a visual novel for the PS2 developed by Yeti. A light novel based on the game was serialized in a magazine previous to the game's release, and a 13-episode anime adaptation was created, also.

results.deck: NPPL Championship Paintball 2009 is paintball game published by Activision. It was the first paintball game released for the current generation of consoles.

results.deck: "Seven-Colored Drops" is a visual novel by UNiSONSHIFT for adults. The PS2 and DS versions have the adult elements removed. Character designer Noizi Ito, famous for her Haruhi and Shana designs, worked on this game.

results.deck: A Playstation 2 exclusive companion piece to World at War, featuring unique missions, engagements and challenges.
